TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISelectionItemProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，UI 自动化客户端可通过这些方法和属性访问实现 的容器的各个可选择的子控件。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual, selectable child controls of containers that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上控件模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddToSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 将当前元素添加到所选项的集合。

span.span: Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对的调用结果是单个项被选定，则发送该元素; 否则发送或根据。If the result of a call to is that a single item is selected, then send an for that element; otherwise send an or as appropriate. > [!NOTE] > 此规则不依赖基于与容器是否允许单个或多个选择，或基于时使用的方法以更改选择。This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection. 仅结果非常重要。Only the result matters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将项添加到选定项的集合。The following example code adds the item to a collection of selected items. [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#AddToSelection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#addtoselection)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#AddToSelection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb#addtoselection)] [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#IsSelected](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#isselected)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#IsSelected](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb#isselected)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示某个项是否处于选定状态。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.

value.span: 如果元素已选定，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is selected; otherwise .

summary.span: 从所选项的集合删除当前元素。

span.span: Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送根据。Send an as appropriate. > [!NOTE] > 此规则不依赖基于与容器是否允许单个或多个选择，或基于时使用的方法以更改选择。This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection. 仅结果非常重要。Only the result matters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从选定项的集合中移除项。The following example code removes the item from a collection of selected items. summary.span: 取消选择所有选定项，然后选择当前元素。

span.span: Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectionContainer As IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 获取实现 并且充当调用对象的容器的 UI 自动化提供程序。

span.span: Gets the UI Automation provider that implements and acts as the container for the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回包含此列表项的列表框的 UI 自动化提供程序。The following example code returns the UI Automation provider for the list box that contains this list item.
